page.title: 13The Arts Of Otley.
page.content: Otley library is used by most of the population of Otley.It has a childrens library as well as an adults.Otley has a pop group called Warrior.Concerts and plays are often held at the Civic Centre and sometimes at Prince Henry's Grammar School.The Otley museum shows the history of Otley and its people.It has many interesting exhibits.There is an art club in Otley which is quite popular.Otley Little Theatre performs at the Civic Centre.The Little Theatre consisting of about 35 actors and 20 back stage members performs 4 plays a year.The last play is performed at Clitheroe in Lancashire.The group spend 4 days a week for six weeks rehearsing before a play.Comedies are the most popular with Otley audiences. By David Grooby and Paul Clayton.
